name: Mahoujin GuruGuru
overview: Mahoujin GuruGuru ("Spinning Magic Circle") is based on an anime series of the same name that was itself written and presented as a parody of standard Japanese RPG tropes of its era. It was followed by Mahoujin GuruGuru 2, a 1996 Super Famicom sequel, and the GBC game Doki Doki Densetsu: Mahoujin GuruGuru.
